name: LAS Arrivals Query
description: Retrieves a summary of flights currently en route to Las Vegas Harry Reid International Airport
initial_prompt: Provide me a summary of flights inbound into LAS.

name: Ground Operations Query
description: Fetches details on aircraft currently on the ground or taxiing at Las Vegas
initial_prompt: Provide me a summary of flights on the ground and taxiing in LAS.

name: Multi-Airport Comparison Query
description: Compares inbound flight volumes between two major airports within a specified timeframe
initial_prompt: Compare the number of inbound flights to LAS and SFO in the next 2 hours.

name: Busiest Airport Ground Congestion Query
description: Identifies which of the top five busiest U.S. airports currently has the most taxiing aircraft
initial_prompt: Which of the top 5 busiest US airports currently has the most aircraft taxiing?

name: Flight Delay Detection Query
description: Investigates inbound flights to JFK airport exceeding 30-minute arrival delays
initial_prompt: Are there any inbound flights to JFK that are more than 30 minutes behind their scheduled arrival time?

name: Airspace Utilization Query
description: Analyzes current flight altitude data over Colorado to understand vertical airspace distribution
initial_prompt: What's the average altitude of flights currently over Colorado?

name: Basic Flight Plan Access Test
description: Verify connection and retrieve sample flight plan documents
initial_prompt: Get me an example flight plan document from the database.

name: Flight Adherence Analysis
description: Compare actual vs. planned flight path for specific flights
initial_prompt: How well has flight {{Flight ID}} adhered to its flight plan?

name: Route Deviation Detection
description: Identify flights exceeding lateral deviation thresholds
initial_prompt: Show me all flights that have deviated more than {{Deviation Threshold}} nautical miles from their planned route in the last {{Time Period}}.

name: Schedule Compliance Check
description: Find flights behind estimated arrival times
initial_prompt: Which flights are currently more than {{Delay Threshold}} minutes behind their planned schedule?

name: Altitude Compliance Monitoring
description: Identify altitude deviations from assigned flight levels
initial_prompt: List any flights not maintaining their assigned cruise altitude within {{Altitude Tolerance}} feet.

name: Fuel Efficiency Comparison
description: Evaluate actual vs. planned fuel consumption metrics
initial_prompt: Compare actual vs. planned fuel burn rates for flights between {{Origin Airport}} and {{Destination Airport}}.

name: Landing Report Workflow
description: Automated workflow for generating comprehensive landing reports when flights land
initial_prompt:
Generate a landing report for flight {{Flight ID}} that landed at {{Airport}} at {{Timestamp}}.
Include route adherence, timing performance, and any significant events.

name: 101 - SOPs overview
description: Provides an overview of the FDPS and STDDS OPS from the RAG database
initial_prompt: Tell me about the FDPS and STDDS systems and data.

name: 102 - SOPs analysis
description: Provides an analysis of the FDPS and STDDS OPS from the RAG database
initial_prompt: Tell me what types of outcomes I could expect by analyzing data from these systems.
